Adventurer Helper:
It is nothing too difficult... all you need to do is visit *Armor Merchant Alisia in Rune Township* and collect a letter to deliver to someone... she didn`t list who you would be delivering the letter to. Yes, I suppose she could use the mail system hust like everyone else, but she has requested a more physical presence to attend to the matter. Still interested?
